import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';const API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY||'dev-key-12345';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','x-api-key':API_KEY}});export const applicationsApi={// Scan applications folder
async scanApplications(){const response=await api.get('/applications/scan');return response.data;},// Get single application
async getApplication(id){const response=await api.get("/applications/".concat(id));return response.data;},// Evaluate application
async evaluateApplication(id){const response=await api.get("/applications/".concat(id,"/evaluate"));return response.data;}};export default api;
